1.0.name: wordpress/singsong
1.0.description:
SingSong Wordpress plugin allows you to add a background sound or music to each section of your Blog (Home, Single, Page, Archive).

Characteristics :

  • Understands the importance of cross-browser compatibility
  • Supports all major audio formats
Usage :

Two ways to use SingSong plugin :

  • Background Sound or music : You can associate a sound file with each section of your website : a sepecific page or post , all pages or posts, Home, archives... When the page/post is displayed in a Web browser, the sound file repeats the number of times that you specify (Loop or just one time). Activate the plugin and enter the full URL of an audio file or playlist for each section/page/post of your site. Examples: Home : http://www.mymusic.com/mysong1.mp3 So mysong1.mp3 will be played every time someone visits your home page

  • Player : This plugin comes also with
